summary: The life and career of the renowned film critic and social commentator, Roger Ebert.
cast: Martin Scorsese|Werner Herzog|Ava DuVernay|Errol Morris|Stephen Stanton|Roger Ebert|Ramin Bahrani|Gregory Nava|Gene Siskel|Steve James|Chaz Ebert|Donna La Pietra|Marlene Siskel|Jonathan Rosenbaum|A.O. Scott|William Nack|Nancy De Los Santos|Richard Corliss|Sonia Evans|Thea Flaum|Howie Movshovitz|Roger Simon|Raven Evans|Bruce Elliot|Josh Golden|Tom McNamee|John McHugh|Rick Kogan|Laura Emerick|Saul Bellow|Ben Bradlee|Johnny Carson|Barbara Harris|Hugh Hefner|Al Jolson|Pauline Kael|Martin Luther King|David Letterman|Jerry Lewis|Russ Meyer|Rupert Murdoch|Andrew Sarris|Studs Terkel|Oprah Winfrey
title: Life Itself
